name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1, Zhengzhou, Henan. Homeowners of Yuhuacheng Community reported that they bought school district housing, but the primary school promised by the developer had not been built when the school was about to start, leaving their children without a school to go to. The owners had no choice but to kneel down and kowtow to the developer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 3, Bloomberg reported that Sun Wen, a former assistant to New York Governor Kathy Hochul, was arrested at her home in New York on Tuesday on charges of being an agent of the Chinese government.
Sun Wen reportedly worked in the New York State government for about 15 years and was fired last year by the Deputy Commissioner of Strategic Business Development of the New York State Department of Labor. The reason for her dismissal was that there was evidence of misconduct.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
3,000 owners of the two residential areas of Poly Zhongjiao Yunshang and China Resources Park Jiuli in Fengxiang New Town, Xiang'an, Xiamen, protested and defended their rights because they found that the school promised before the purchase was not built after the delivery of the house
It is reported that the reason given by the government is that cultural relics and historical sites were found underground at the school site. However, the owners believe that the area of Fengxiang New Town was formed by land reclamation and there is no possibility of cultural relics. This is just an excuse by the authorities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. Department of Justice alleges that Sun Wen used Chinese funds and her influence in New York State to benefit the Chinese government and obtained a lot of economic and other benefits, including her husband Hu's business in China and the employment of her relatives. The couple used the funds to buy high-end real estate and various luxury cars, and opened bank accounts in the names of relatives for money laundering.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @qiaohuanxin I already said you are a rookie. The picture shows your trending search, not the square trending search. And this post has been blocked

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 3, the Ministry of Civil Affairs' official website recently announced that there are 296.97 million elderly people aged 60 and above in the country, accounting for 21.1% of the total population.
Among them,
43.344 million elderly people enjoy old-age subsidies
6.214 million elderly people enjoy old-age service subsidies
985,000 elderly people enjoy nursing subsidies
667,000 elderly people enjoy comprehensive subsidies
The country has spent a total of 42.17 billion yuan on old-age welfare funds and 22.32 billion yuan on old-age services.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, economist Liu Jipeng released a video revealing that Hu Xijin was traveling abroad. Speaking of the ban, Hu Xijin said he would lift the ban on October 27, and said that after October 27, "people will see a more mature Hu Xijin."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of the time of posting: the reports from Sohu and Lianhe Zaobao have been deleted, and the original video posted by Liu Jipeng has also been deleted by the platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, the Xi'an self-media Zhenguan public account was blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, according to information provided by the driver's relatives, the boy was run over by his cyclist and the driver was arrested for negligence. The relative said that he was suffering from leukemia and his family saved money to pay for medical treatment. "I don't quite understand why an accidental traffic accident was classified as a criminal case, and where did the cyclist who knocked down the child go? Where did the organizer of the ride go? Is it all the driver's fault?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of the time of writing, all of his relatives’ Weibo accounts have been cleared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 4, Ma'anshan, Anhui. The video of "Anhui Rural Commercial Bank security guard stabbed the president with a knife" circulated online shows a man holding a sharp knife and drinking water in the bank, and then medical staff pushed a wounded man with blood on his upper body into an ambulance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 4, Zhongshan, Guangdong. In the early morning, a truck hit a crowd of people at the morning market in Gangkou Town, and many people fell to the ground. The police reported that the driver had been controlled and the accident was caused by improper operation of the truck driver.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2, Puning, Guangdong. The letter of commitment against school bullying issued by Puning Chengbei Middle School states that "if school bullying occurs, we will not take photos or record videos."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1, Liangshan, Sichuan. A netizen posted a video saying that when he first came to Liangshan, he saw the children wearing shabby clothes, so he brought new clothes and quilts to the children, but their homes did not even have a place to put clean clothes. He cooked for the children, but found that there were only potatoes at home. He told them to study hard, but the children thought that the way out was to go out to work early. The village head said that most of these children are orphans or left-behind children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, Russian Foreign Ministry spokesperson Shakalova responded to Lai Ching-te's statement that China should ask Russia for the occupied territory. She said Moscow and Beijing had resolved border disputes in 2004 and renounced any territorial claims against each other. Russia implements the "one China" principle, so Taiwan leaders have no right to speak on behalf of Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A post about Xinjiang stability maintenance in 2009 triggered the memories of a group of veterans.
Some mentioned, "Those with poor stress tolerance will come back to receive long-term psychological intervention," "The whole village will be worked on," "Regardless of gender or age."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, China published for the first time a list of 2,590 American aviation heroes who fought against the Japanese aggression, sparking heated discussions. Netizens responded: The pace is too fast, I can't keep up, should I continue to scold Americans, should CCTV6 broadcast "The Yellow River Love"?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens reported that public institutions in Henan Province were unable to pay salaries. One netizen said that he was an employee of a public institution in a small county in Sanmenxia City, Henan Province, and had not received salary for 8 months. "I only get 2,800 yuan a month, and it has not been paid yet. How can I live like this?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, A-shares once again started the battle to defend 2800 points. On that day, economist Ren Zeping posted two Weibo posts mockingly: "You looked down on 3000 points before, but now you can't reach 3000 points." "Laugh at 3000, question 3000, accept 3000, and long for 3000." As of September 4, A-shares closed at 2784.28.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, a netizen reported the incident in a "yin-yang" way, asking the Qingdao police, "I will be coming to Qingdao tomorrow. Can I drive against the flow of traffic? I want to beat up a Qingdao person, and then give him 1,000 yuan. Can I do that?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A TV station staff member in Anhui revealed that if various targets are not met, wages will be deducted, and most of them receive more than 1,000 yuan. Some employees’ wages were deducted into negative numbers, and they still have to pay money back to the company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 3, Beijing Youth Daily: Consciously treat the country’s major and happy events as your own affairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens said: I didn’t expect that a newspaper from 14 years ago would still be applicable today

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, in Hengyang, Hunan, because the quality of the Jinzhongfu real estate project did not meet the standards and the houses were forced to be delivered in violation of regulations, the owners knelt in front of the city government to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that Linyi, Shandong will adjust the grid workers in Yihe New District starting from September 1, and the reward and subsidy funds for the grid workers will be distributed until August 31.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, the police report on the Qingdao Land Rover woman beating incident has triggered a collective breakdown of the veterans.
Some veterans began to upload videos to remove the "Glorious Home" honor plaques hanging in their homes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, Reference News quoted foreign media reports: India's economic growth has slowed sharply, with the financial and real estate sectors showing signs of decline, the tertiary industry slowing down sharply, and certain economic sectors lacking vitality.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens initiated a vote. If the following people unfortunately fell into a well and only one person could be saved, who would you choose to save? The voting results showed that 14,000 people chose to save Ma Baoguo, and Zhang Weiwei had the lowest number of votes, with only 357 votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 3, Xuzhou, Jiangsu. Parents posted a video to complain that the 15-yuan meal for high school students at Jiuli Middle School was not enough to fill them up, and they could only barely soak their rice in soup.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 3 (Release) Tianjin. A vendor chased and hacked at an urban management officer with a knife, and the urban management officer fled in panic. 
September 3, Suzhou, Jiangsu. A mobile vendor said that a group of plainclothes officers did not allow him to set up a stall and charged him 88 yuan. The stall owner said, "This is Chinese land, why don't you let me set up a stall!"
